title: "Hyundai And Kia Will Use Rainwater To Keep LiDAR And Self-Driving Sensors Clean"
excerpt: "Hyundai and Kia have jointly filed a patent for a compressor cooling system for cleaning exterior vehicle sensors such as LiDAR, and one of its main innovations is the use of rainwater. The invention was discovered by CarBuzz and filed with the United States Patent Office."
